alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 5:22AM AKST until February 12 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing with with low visibility and very cold wind chills occuring. Plan on slippery road conditions. Additional snow accumulations of one inch are expected. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 40 below. * WHERE...North of Unalakleet. * WHEN...Until 4 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds gusting to 40 mph at Shaktoolik are causing visibility of one half mile or less at times and wind chills to 40 below. These conditions will continue through this afternoon, then improve this evening as wind decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
